name: Burger Sauce

images.alt: Closeup shot of delicious burger sauce spread on a burger bun.

ingredients.name: Mayonnaise
ingredients.notes: Full Fat, donâ€™t sub sour cream, yoghurt etc.

ingredients.name: Ketchup
ingredients.notes: Avoid any brands which you know are particularly vinegary.

ingredients.name: Mustard
ingredients.notes: I use Dijon, but Classic Yellow works great.

ingredients.name: Pickle juice
ingredients.notes: Gherkin in UK, Dill Pickle in US

ingredients.name: Onion powder
ingredients.notes: For a smooth burger sauce, use powder. But you could use a small amount of finely minced shallot/white onion.

instructions: Add all of your ingredients in a mixing bowl and stir to combine. Adjust seasoning to preference then tightly cover and pop in the fridge, or serve right away!
notes: How long does Burger Sauce keep? Like most condiments burger sauce has a long shelf life if keep tightly sealed in the fridge. I usually keep mine for around 3-4days, but feel free to store for a lot longer at your discretion. If at all in doubt just look at the shelf life of the mayo, ketchup and mustard you use.
